subject: Pro X Ultra brake pedal issue
description_text:
Hey I bought the pro x ultra pedals a couple weeks ago I’m having a problem with the brake pedal hydraulic rod resistance adjustment I can’t not get it work there’s no difference in resistance if I put it 0 or if I put it on 8 any help would be greatly appreciated.
P.s I’m loving the the pro x ultra pedals best investment I have made on my sim rig y’all did a awesome job with designing the pedals also I would like to buy the lighted heel stop but I do not see it on y’all’s website do yall sale just the lighted heel stop thank you and look forward to hearing from you. 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Bobby Philpott,     Previously, our 8-level damper had significant differences in resistance. However, many users reported that levels 3 and above were too stiff to press. In response, we released a new lighter resistance version, allowing smooth and easy pressing across all 0-8 levels.  While there are still differences between each level, they may not feel very noticeable underfoot, though the difference is more apparent when applying pressure by hand. This is perfectly fine, as hydraulic systems are primarily designed for damping and cushioning purposes, and resistance adjustments are typically achieved using dampers of different colors and hardness levels.
Sorry, could you provide us with a video showing the adjustable hydraulic dampers.

Thank you for your response yes I can provide y’all with a video of the
damper this afternoon when I get home from work do you need a video of just
the damper or of the damper when I’m pressing the brake at different levels
thanks again

On Mon, Sep 8, 2025 at 6:31 AM service@simsonn.com

Hey guys here’s the video that you requested of the adjustable hydraulic
damper thank you

Sorry about that you should be able to view it now

wrote:

> Hey guys I never heard back from you after I sent yallthe video tall
> requested just wanted to see what tall thought about the hydraulic damper
> thank you

> On Tue, Sep 9, 2025 at 10:38 PM Bobby Philpott <
> streetglidehog103@gmail.com> wrote:
>
>> Sorry about that you should be able to view it now

>> On Tue, Sep 9, 2025 at 7:38 PM service@simsonn.com

We’re very sorry for the delayed reply. I noticed in your video that the effect of the adjustable hydraulic rod on the pedals does appear to be less obvious. However, its main function is actually to provide hydraulic damping, which makes the pedal feel smoother and more consistent when pressed. If you would like to adjust the pedal force itself, you would need to change the elastomers. Please try to feel again whether the hydraulic rod is truly not functioning. If it turns out that it is indeed not working, we will arrange a replacement for you — please don’t worry.

Thank you for the clarification. Can I please get an answer to for the
lighted heel stop do yall sell just the heel stop if so can you please send
me a link to it so I can purchase it thank you again

On Wed, Sep 17, 2025 at 11:37 PM service@simsonn.com

Hello, if you require only this component, you may purchase this link and add a note.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/carbon-fiber-heel-plate-1   If you also require the Carbon Fibre Heel Plate and the heel stop, you can purchase twice this link.

Thank you, I will be buying that come this Friday thank you again for all
the replies

On Mon, Sep 22, 2025 at 6:28 AM service@simsonn.com
Alright, remember to add a note to your order after purchase.

Hey I placed the order and added a note about the heel stop wanted to make
sure that got shipped out thank you
